column4: I FINALLY got compiz working with my ATI card... i'm so happy :) But a problem... the system hangs for a seconds then and then, and after that it goes well again for a while. A simple task like scrolling can be a bit jerky. Ideas? Doesn't seem to be any 3D rendering problem
Actually it seems like scrolling is the biggest problem
how can i check that? the one built in gutsy
